metadata.title: CVE-2022-0740 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect authorization in the Asana integration's branch restrictionfeature in all versions of GitLab CE/EE starting from version 7.8.0 before14.7.7, all versions starting from 14.8 before 14.8.5, all versionsstarting from 14.9 before 14.9.2 makes it possible to close Asana tasksfrom unrestricted branches.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
